summary: What exactly is Jungkook running from?
title: What exactly is Jungkook running from?
body:
When Jungkook is running in the hall and the floor comes out from underneath him as he passes…… what exactly is going on there?

Is he running away from something or is he running so that he can actually look into the other room?

summary: I agree with the feminization anon like jimin aint that small, he also has a black belt in taekwondo. The elegant contemporary...
question: I agree with the feminization anon like jimin aint that small, he also has a black belt in taekwondo. The elegant contemporary dancer thing in fics also bothers me cause the male contemporary dancers are really muscular and theyre not usually small. Instead of making jimin the character who desperately needs saving, make him a strong badass who can whoop some ass who happens to have a soft side.
answer: I love the final sentence of this because it’s so true. I don’t know when we started creating the stereotype of Jimin as the Lois Lane of every story. I want to make it clear that I in absolutely no way mean that muscular people can’t be feminine, I just mean they’re muscular?? it’s a fact?? the boy’s got hella arms and legs, he’s definitely not some small fairy. He can take care of himself, and I hate that because he’s a few centimetres shorter or has a slightly higher voice we forget that. Hyper-feminzing one person in a ship and making the other overtly masculine sadly is very heteronormative because it adds to the idea that you need a feminine person and a masculine person in a relationship. while jimin’s comfortable in his feminine side, his masculinity is still a big part of him and like you said; he’s a strong badass who can whoop some ass.

tags: lol imma be reblogging this every damn day idgaf
summary: Hey ARMYS, let’s make the conscious effort to NOT be ableist pieces of shit at BTS’ concerts.
title: Hey ARMYS, let’s make the conscious effort to NOT be ableist pieces of shit at BTS’ concerts.
body:
At the first KCON in California, a girl’s picture was spread on Tumblr because she switched between using a wheelchair and standing up throughout the convention. You guys tormented her and claimed she was ‘faking it’ because she wasn’t constantly sitting in her wheelchair.

WELL MY NAME’S HONEY, I HAVE EHLERS-DANLOS SYNDROME, AND I’M HERE TO TELL YOU HOW DISABILITIES ACTUALLY WORK, PARTICULARLY THE INVISIBLE KIND! 

So first and foremost, you can’t tell if someone’s disabled just by looking at them or their actions.
If you see someone ‘normal’ looking sitting in a section reserved for the disabled, they ARE in fact disabled! Their disability probably isn’t obvious, but it’s still there and is causing them significant issues, to the point where a reserved seat or line might be vital for them to make it through the night. Don’t try to take that from them, it’s not okay!

Medical conditions aren’t always predictable, so neither are our needs.
Going back to KCON, the girl wasn’t using her wheelchair consistently. That’s actually very normal for people with disabilities! Different situations require different tools; walking around a sweaty, crowded convention or concert, a person may choose to make their day easier by using a wheelchair or walker. It saves time and energy, and prevents major injuries. But when looking at a raised booth or trying to see above a crowd, they may feel comfortable standing up for any length of time. If you make them feel like they can’t adjust for their personal comfort, you’re essentially trying to exclude them, whether you realize it or not.

Call out culture is toxic for those with invisible disabilities or illnesses.
I get it. There are actual assholes in the world, and you don’t want them thinking it’s okay to use services for the disabled if they don’t actually need them. But who are you to make that call? More often than not, vigilante justice is a disservice to people with invisible illnesses because people assume we’re totally healthy and are just being assholes. We get glared out, scolded, and even forcefully removed from places that were built for us because we don’t match society’s definition of ‘disabled.’ Trust me, it’s better to let a dozen people abuse the system than to keep even one person from getting what they need.

If you see this, PLEASE reblog! I don’t want a repeat of what happeed at KCON to happen at BTS’ concert.

body:
Will someone help me learn Korean?

I’ve recently gotten into kpop, specifically BTS, and I really want to learn Korean but every app that I’ve downloaded is either too confusing or expensive or boring or just skips around a lot.

So I was hoping someone on here would be willing to teach me. Preferably someone from Korea or of Korean decent who’s first language is Korean and second is English as I feel like this would benefit me more but if you’re American or Canadian or something and really know the language then I’ll be okay with that too.

If you’re expecting payment, I don’t have money. But I can pay you in friendship, love and attention as well as the thought of knowing you’re smarter than me for knowing 2+ languages. :3

Dm me if you’re interested!

blog.name: peace-love-yaoi
blog.title: Fangirl Life
blog.description: When life hands you lemons, write fanfiction.

title: Alpha’s Promise Ch.2
body:
15 YEARS AGO

Jungkook sat next to Jimin on an old tree stump, watching him weave a crown out of little blue flowers. The blond smiled as he presented it to him, trying to place it on Jungkook’s head. The black-haired boy dodged it, and Jimin followed him, toppling them both over and they tussled on the ground until he pinned Jimin down and put the crown on him instead. They were both giggling, until Jungkook gave him a chaste kiss. The smile Jimin gave him was blindingly brilliant, the last smile he ever saw on the other’s face.

He felt the hard hands pulling them apart, yanking him up by the hair and the back of his shirt. The rough hands tied him up as he tried to get back to Jimin. He could hear a loud smack, and someone yelling, he looked over to see Jimin cowering, tears flowing from his eyes, as the blood stained his lips, and a large bruise formed on his cheek. Jungkook felt the unfamiliar aggression rise in his body, his canines punched down into his mouth, the growl that reverberated from his chest was inhuman, a dark threat. But he was still too young, too weak to overpower the adult men holding him back.

He could see the bright red of his eyes glow reflecting off the trees and grass. As if in response, the bright glow of white flared from the other side of the clearing, reaching out to him. Their eyes met, red glow meeting white, Alpha and Omega. The pack members seemed to find this amusing, their laughter and cat calls rang through the forest.

“Looks like we got a little Alpha!”

“Gonna get a good price for him!”

“Aww… Are you in love little baby?”

After they were dragged back to the camp, Jungkook was handed off to some rough looking men with a wheeled cart that seemed to be fashioned a cage. He recognized that these men were Slavers. The most abominable of all people, they trafficked their unwilling victims into all sorts of unsavory places to be used as whores, slaves, or gladiators. They hauled him up into the cage and locked him inside. A tall dark-haired man, obviously the pack Alpha, spoke with the men and some gold exchanged hands before the Slavers mounted up and started to take him away.

He could see in the distance Jimin being dragged into the middle of a crowd, his shirt ripped off and his hands tied to a whipping post. Jungkook struggled with every ounce of strength in his little body, trying to escape to no avail. The same dark man who had taken the money from the Slavers took up a whip and Jungkook watched in horror as the corded leather met the pale skin of Jimin’s back, leaving a deep, bloody welt. The scream of pain that Jimin released absolutely tore Jungkook’s heart out.

Completely helpless, Jungkook howled and screamed. “Wait for me! I will come for you! I promise, I will find you… I love you.”

He watched the whip make five more strikes before the cart turned a corner and he lost sight of Jimin.

 

5 YEARS LATER

Jungkook awoke with a hoarse whimper. His body jerking violently as he surfaced from the nightmare, causing the thick links in the chain attached to his ankle to clink in the dark silence of his cell. It had been nearly 5 years since he had been sold by the Slavers to the owner of the fighting pits in the capitol city. He had been unable to escape; his captors had always been careful to make sure to keep him chained at all times. In this place, he was as good as merchandise, and they planned on protecting their investment.

At thirteen he was now old enough to enter the arena, and he knew they would come for him soon. He was not afraid, he had worked hard to become strong over the last few years. The masters of the fighting pits, always kept them well fed, they wanted the fighters to be strong. Strong fighters made for interesting fights, which in turn led to more money from the betting pools and audience. That however did not stop them from abusing the slaves, beating them for any minor offense.

He would take the opportunity to get stronger, to learn to fight. If he was going to find and rescue Jimin, he would probably need those skills. His body was no longer his own, and not because he was legally owned as a slave; no, his body belonged to his mate, his other half, and he was driven by the need to protect, to shelter, to defend. For the time being, he would fight and learn anything he could, so that when the time came, he would be ready.

It was no surprise then, when the masters came the following day and told him that he would be fighting in his first match that very day; and later, when he stood across from his opponent, there was no fear in him. His body was primed for the fight, he was full of anger and he was ready to release it upon someone. They were not permitted weapons, as this was only a first fight, and they were both young, they would fight only hand to hand.

When his first blow made contact, he felt a powerful surge of satisfaction, and when his opponent got him with a retaliatory hit, it only sparked his aggression. In his mind’s eye, he saw Jimin, tied to that post, hit after hit raining on his back, and his primal inner wolf only saw the other that he fought as an obstacle, a road block on his path back to his mate. He roared at the other, his canines elongating, and eyes glowing red as his inner Alpha took control. He was completely unhinged and savage.

Jungkook ran at the other, slamming into him full force and taking him to the ground, he roared again and bit into the flesh of the other, tearing a chunk out of his shoulder and spitting it away. Blood poured from the wound, coating Jungkook’s hands as they wrapped around the other’s throat. Somewhere in his mind, his voice told him to just choke the other into unconsciousness and take the win, but he couldn’t get control of his body, and next thing he knew, he felt the crack of the other’s neck beneath his hold.

The other boy’s body went limp, he shoved the corpse away from him, scrambling backward as if putting physical distance between himself and the dead body could distance him from what he had done. Only in that moment did he finally hear the crowd, they went wild as he stood from the ground, as if someone had turned the volume up suddenly. He felt himself come back to his body, he could feel the blood running down his face and chest, and became aware the taste of blood and dirt in his mouth. He wanted to be sick, and in that moment, he felt a hollow ache take up residence in his chest.

Later that night, as he lay in his cell, he felt for the first time as if he were unworthy of Jimin. He was a murderer, and he knew that he would have to kill again, and keep doing it until he could escape this captivity. When he looked down at his hands, he felt like crying; the blood of his nameless opponent was still under his fingernails. He calmed his breath and meticulously picked the red-brown flakes from his hands. He felt so cold inside, but he knew that he was only doing what he had to in order to survive.

As he lay alone in his cell, metal cuff chafing his ankle, he felt the same old ache settle in his chest. He longed for his mate, his other half, and as he fell into a restless sleep he felt a single tear slip from the side of his eye and slide over his skin.

reblog.comment:
15 YEARS AGO

Jungkook sat next to Jimin on an old tree stump, watching him weave a crown out of little blue flowers. The blond smiled as he presented it to him, trying to place it on Jungkook’s head. The black-haired boy dodged it, and Jimin followed him, toppling them both over and they tussled on the ground until he pinned Jimin down and put the crown on him instead. They were both giggling, until Jungkook gave him a chaste kiss. The smile Jimin gave him was blindingly brilliant, the last smile he ever saw on the other’s face.

He felt the hard hands pulling them apart, yanking him up by the hair and the back of his shirt. The rough hands tied him up as he tried to get back to Jimin. He could hear a loud smack, and someone yelling, he looked over to see Jimin cowering, tears flowing from his eyes, as the blood stained his lips, and a large bruise formed on his cheek. Jungkook felt the unfamiliar aggression rise in his body, his canines punched down into his mouth, the growl that reverberated from his chest was inhuman, a dark threat. But he was still too young, too weak to overpower the adult men holding him back.

He could see the bright red of his eyes glow reflecting off the trees and grass. As if in response, the bright glow of white flared from the other side of the clearing, reaching out to him. Their eyes met, red glow meeting white, Alpha and Omega. The pack members seemed to find this amusing, their laughter and cat calls rang through the forest.

“Looks like we got a little Alpha!”

“Gonna get a good price for him!”

“Aww… Are you in love little baby?”

After they were dragged back to the camp, Jungkook was handed off to some rough looking men with a wheeled cart that seemed to be fashioned a cage. He recognized that these men were Slavers. The most abominable of all people, they trafficked their unwilling victims into all sorts of unsavory places to be used as whores, slaves, or gladiators. They hauled him up into the cage and locked him inside. A tall dark-haired man, obviously the pack Alpha, spoke with the men and some gold exchanged hands before the Slavers mounted up and started to take him away.

He could see in the distance Jimin being dragged into the middle of a crowd, his shirt ripped off and his hands tied to a whipping post. Jungkook struggled with every ounce of strength in his little body, trying to escape to no avail. The same dark man who had taken the money from the Slavers took up a whip and Jungkook watched in horror as the corded leather met the pale skin of Jimin’s back, leaving a deep, bloody welt. The scream of pain that Jimin released absolutely tore Jungkook’s heart out.

Completely helpless, Jungkook howled and screamed. “Wait for me! I will come for you! I promise, I will find you… I love you.”

He watched the whip make five more strikes before the cart turned a corner and he lost sight of Jimin.

 

5 YEARS LATER

Jungkook awoke with a hoarse whimper. His body jerking violently as he surfaced from the nightmare, causing the thick links in the chain attached to his ankle to clink in the dark silence of his cell. It had been nearly 5 years since he had been sold by the Slavers to the owner of the fighting pits in the capitol city. He had been unable to escape; his captors had always been careful to make sure to keep him chained at all times. In this place, he was as good as merchandise, and they planned on protecting their investment.

At thirteen he was now old enough to enter the arena, and he knew they would come for him soon. He was not afraid, he had worked hard to become strong over the last few years. The masters of the fighting pits, always kept them well fed, they wanted the fighters to be strong. Strong fighters made for interesting fights, which in turn led to more money from the betting pools and audience. That however did not stop them from abusing the slaves, beating them for any minor offense.

He would take the opportunity to get stronger, to learn to fight. If he was going to find and rescue Jimin, he would probably need those skills. His body was no longer his own, and not because he was legally owned as a slave; no, his body belonged to his mate, his other half, and he was driven by the need to protect, to shelter, to defend. For the time being, he would fight and learn anything he could, so that when the time came, he would be ready.

It was no surprise then, when the masters came the following day and told him that he would be fighting in his first match that very day; and later, when he stood across from his opponent, there was no fear in him. His body was primed for the fight, he was full of anger and he was ready to release it upon someone. They were not permitted weapons, as this was only a first fight, and they were both young, they would fight only hand to hand.

When his first blow made contact, he felt a powerful surge of satisfaction, and when his opponent got him with a retaliatory hit, it only sparked his aggression. In his mind’s eye, he saw Jimin, tied to that post, hit after hit raining on his back, and his primal inner wolf only saw the other that he fought as an obstacle, a road block on his path back to his mate. He roared at the other, his canines elongating, and eyes glowing red as his inner Alpha took control. He was completely unhinged and savage.

Jungkook ran at the other, slamming into him full force and taking him to the ground, he roared again and bit into the flesh of the other, tearing a chunk out of his shoulder and spitting it away. Blood poured from the wound, coating Jungkook’s hands as they wrapped around the other’s throat. Somewhere in his mind, his voice told him to just choke the other into unconsciousness and take the win, but he couldn’t get control of his body, and next thing he knew, he felt the crack of the other’s neck beneath his hold.

The other boy’s body went limp, he shoved the corpse away from him, scrambling backward as if putting physical distance between himself and the dead body could distance him from what he had done. Only in that moment did he finally hear the crowd, they went wild as he stood from the ground, as if someone had turned the volume up suddenly. He felt himself come back to his body, he could feel the blood running down his face and chest, and became aware the taste of blood and dirt in his mouth. He wanted to be sick, and in that moment, he felt a hollow ache take up residence in his chest.

Later that night, as he lay in his cell, he felt for the first time as if he were unworthy of Jimin. He was a murderer, and he knew that he would have to kill again, and keep doing it until he could escape this captivity. When he looked down at his hands, he felt like crying; the blood of his nameless opponent was still under his fingernails. He calmed his breath and meticulously picked the red-brown flakes from his hands. He felt so cold inside, but he knew that he was only doing what he had to in order to survive.

As he lay alone in his cell, metal cuff chafing his ankle, he felt the same old ache settle in his chest. He longed for his mate, his other half, and as he fell into a restless sleep he felt a single tear slip from the side of his eye and slide over his skin.

summary:
The invitation.
Disconnected |part 1|
Andrea and Yoongi meet and share similar passions, but they both have dark pasts that...
body:
Disconnected |1|

The invitation.


Disconnected |part 1|

Andrea and Yoongi meet and share similar passions, but they both have dark pasts that threaten to haunt their future. They want to disconnect from their pasts but will they disconnect from each other instead?

title: MTL: Date a 99 Liner (BTS)
body:
Doing this type of thing makes me feel like a child…I got requests for 92 and 96 and 97 and even now with this, I’m still younger than everyone??? I mean not by much, but like…am I a fetus???

Most:

Jungkook

V//Taehyung

Jimin

Suga//Yoongi

RM//Namjoon

J-Hope//Hoseok

Jin

Least^

Mastelist is here!
